{{champion:267}} She's got everything. Her bubble is actually easier for me to hit now than most other champion's skillshots. She's also the only enchanter that can hard carry in bronze. I like Janna and all, but good luck trying to do that like Nami can.

{{champion:26}} A good one of these is a nightmare. I'm not so great when it comes to combos, but zipping in to a fight to ult your teammate right as they're about to die is one of the most satisfying feelings you can have as a support.

{{champion:115}} Anybody that thinks that Ziggs can't support has not tried it. He's got an empowered auto every 10 seconds, god-tier poke if you know how to hit his Q, CC with his W and kind of with his E, and if you trade with the enemy laners and they just barely survive, you can ult them to finish the job. Not to mention the fact that it's much easier to win lane through satcheling the tower if your ADC doesn't mind sharing the first tower XP.

{{champion:63}} Same reason as Ziggs, he's a fun AP support. I do find it funny that people complain about him so much when Ziggs can do the same thing. He's nowhere near the problem that people make him out to be.
